src:
A porta aberta que te deu entrada, te dará saída!
Gilvan Chaves interpreta TOLICE, de sua autoria. Resgate de Luciano Hortencio.
01 Nov 2019, 09:13 by Luciano Hortencio
Resgate de Luciano Hortencio
Gilvan Chaves interpreta TOLICE, de sua autoria
A maior toliceQue eu já fiz na vidaFoi querer-te tanto.
Minha ingenuidadeFoi tentar contigoUm amor tão santo.
Em tão pouco tempoMinha pobre almaFoi desiludida.
Tu desmoronasteO maior casteloQue eu sonhei na vida.
Mas toda medalhaTem o seu reversoE eu fui reagindo.
E com meu orgulhoMeu amor tão puroFoi diminuindo.
Podes ir emboraJá que tua escadaNão tem mais subida.
Esta porta abertaQue te deu entradaTe dará saída.



Gilvan Chaves – TOLICE – Gilvan Chaves.Musidisc – Hi-Fi 2072.Ano de 1963.Coisas que o tempo levou.luciano hortencio.

text:
The open door that has entered you will give you exit!
Gilvan Chaves plays TOLICE, of his own. Rescue of Luciano Hortencio.
01 Nov 2019, 09:13 by Luciano Hortencio
Luciano Hortencio's Rescue
Gilvan Chaves plays TOLICE, of his own
The biggest nonsense I've ever done in my lifeI wanted you so much.
My naiveteI was trying with you Such holy love.
In such a short timeMy poor soulI was disappointed.
You collapsedThe biggest castle I ever dreamed of in my life.
But every medal has its reverse And I was reacting.
And with my prideMy love so pureIt was diminishing.
You can leave since your ladder has no more climb.
This open doorWhat has checked you in. It will check you out.



Gilvan Chaves - TOLICE - Gilvan Chaves.Musidisc - Hi-Fi 2072.Year of 1963.Things that took time.luciano hortencio.
